title: Web portfolio page
desc: Designed and developed a personalized webpage to showcase my skills, experiences, and projects.
Explored and experimented with innovative features to demonstrate my interest in continuous learning and creativity.

title: JavaScript open source library
desc: Conceptualized and developed a user event tracking system using TypeScript for enhanced analytics.

title: Flutter open source package
desc: Developed and successfully deployed the Kakaomap library, a powerful solution for integrating Kakao maps into Flutter applications.
Garnered widespread adoption, with over 100 apps utilizing the library as their preferred method for implementing Kakao maps.

title: Development blog
desc: Documented and shared my development journey, providing insights into various projects, technologies, and challenges.
Attracted a consistent audience with around 100 daily users finding valuable content on the blog.
Achieved a significant milestone with over 100,000 total visitors, reflecting the blog's impact within the developer community.
